Included with the installation are template files that closely match those that Eucalyptus will generate at VM instantiation time. The file for KVM (libvirt-kvm-windows-example.xml) is located at $EUCALYPTUS/usr/share/eucalyptus/doc/. We recommend that you review this file to acquaint yourself with its contents, noting required files, bridges, and resources. For more information about configuring the libvirt.xml file, go to http://libvirt.org/formatdomain.html.
